item.title: Caroline add a quote by William Butler Yeats
item.description: "Had I the heavens' embroidered cloths, Enwrought with golden and silver light, The blue and the dim and the dark cloths Of night and light and the half light, I would spread the cloths under your feet: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams." -- William Butler Yeats

item.title: Caroline add a quote by W.B. Yeats
Caroline add a quote by William Butler Yeats
item.description: "There is another world, but it is in this one." -- William Butler Yeats

item.title: Caroline add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Caroline add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Caroline add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "Weaseling out of things is important to learn. It's what separates us from the animals ... except the weasel." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "I know all those words, but that sentence makes no sense to me." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Michael Moore
item.description: "We live in the time where we have fictitious election results that elects a fictitious president. We live in a time where we have a man sending us to war for fictitious reasons. " -- Michael Moore

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "I will not play at tug o' war. I'd rather play at hug o' war, Where everyone hugs Instead of tugs, Where everyone giggles And rolls on the rug, Where everyone kisses, And everyone grins, And everyone cuddles, And everyone wins." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "My skin is kind of sort of brownish pinkish yellowish white. My eyes are greyish blueish green, but I'm told they look orange in the night. My hair is reddish blondish brown, but its silver when its wet, and all the colors I am inside have not been invented yet." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "I know a way to stay friends forever, There's really nothing to it, I tell you what to do, And you do it." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "...I am writing these poems from inside a lion..." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Caroline add a quote by shel silverstein
item.description: "would you like to hear the night i bravely fought the- no? alright" -- shel silverstein

item.title: Caroline add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "Toto, I have a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore." -- L. Frank Baum

item.title: Caroline add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "That proves you are unusual,' returned the Scarecrow; 'and I am convinced that the only people worthy of consideration in this world are the unusual ones. For the common folks are like the leaves of a tree, and live and die unnoticed." -- L. Frank Baum

item.title: Caroline add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "When a hurricane damaged my father's house, my brother rushed over with a gas grill, three coolers of beer, and an enormous Fuck-It Bucket - a plastic pail filled with jawbreakers and bite-size candy bars. ("When shit brings you down, just say 'fuck it,' and eat yourself some motherfucking candy.")" -- David Sedaris

item.title: Caroline add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Nobody pours stuffing like you do, my friend." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Benjamin Hoff
item.description:
"It is very hard to be brave," said Piglet, sniffing slightly, "when you're only a Very Small Animal."
Rabbit, who had begun to write very busily, looked up and said: "It is because you are a very small animal that you will be Useful in the adventure before us." -- Benjamin Hoff

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Benjamin Hoff
item.description: "Lots of people talk to animals...Not very many listen though...that's the problem." -- Benjamin Hoff

item.title: Caroline add a quote by William Butler Yeats
item.description: "Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire." -- William Butler Yeats

item.title: Caroline add a quote by David Thorne
item.description: "While I do not have a boyfriend, I do have a friend who is homosexual and I once asked him "Do you ever think about having sex with me because you are gay?" to which he replied "Do you ever think about having sex with Rosie O'Donnell because you are straight? Same thing." -- David Thorne

item.title: Caroline add a quote by David Thorne
item.description: "I would have assumed you understood, despite our vague suggestions otherwise, we do not welcome constructive criticism." -- David Thorne

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "If there are as many minds as there are men, then there are as many kinds of love as there are hearts." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Michael Showalter
item.description: "Like I could take a nap at 4:15 p.m. and then I'll wake up twenty minutes later and have absolutely no clue where I am. I'm like, "What era is this? Is it the 1920s? Am I a flapper? Should I go and put on a flapper costume and go flap at a party?" Then I'm like, "Is that what flappers even do? Flap? Is flapping a verb?" I'm that out of it. And I'm also drenched in sweat. Like some little Dutch boy in knickers ran over to me while I was sleeping and poured a bucket of water on me. Or like I have malaria and it's 1932 and I'm surrounded by mosquito netting. I'm drenched. I'm covered in goo. I'm like a baby deer covered in placenta hobbling around trying to learn how to walk, thinking that it's the 1920s and I'm a flapper and there's a little Dutch boy running around with a bucket of water. That's what naps are like for me." -- Michael Showalter

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Michael Showalter
item.description: "In my perfect world order, it is cold all the time. Everyone wears sweaters and drinks coffee. People don't speak to each other; they read the newspaper. There is no loud music, and cats are in charge." -- Michael Showalter

item.title: Caroline add a quote by Walker Evans
item.description: "Stare, pry, listen, eavesdrop. Die knowing something. You are not here long." -- Walker Evans

item.title: Caroline add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "You have plenty of courage, I am sure," answered Oz. "All you need is confidence in yourself. There is no living thing that is not afraid when it faces danger. The true courage is in facing danger when you are afraid, and that kind of courage you have in plenty." -- L. Frank Baum

item.title: Caroline add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "Now I know I've got a heart because it is breaking. - Tin Man" -- L. Frank Baum
